climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: All day comfort and protection available in five absorbencies with Tampax Pearl tampons up to eight hours
#1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand based on 2020 survey
Free of dyes, perfume, latex, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching natural rubber latex
Your flow is different every day. Your tampon should be, too
LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen
body.description: It’s time to Tampax and live your life without limits. Get incredible all day comfort and protection for up to eight hours with Tampax Pearl tampons. Choose from five different absorbencies to match your changing flow. Got leaks? Go up an absorbency. Uncomfortable to remove? Go down an absorbency. Designed with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen. Tampax Pearl Light Absorbency provides protection you can feel good about. Free of dyes, perfume, latex, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching. Plus, inserting the tampon is made easy thanks to the applicator’s Anti-Slip Grip, while Tampax FormFit protection lets it gently expand to your individual shape. Ready to ditch the leaks? Get amazing protection with Tampax, the #1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand. Discover your perfect flow combo and get the protection you need. natural rubber latex based on 2020 survey

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find your Flow Combo If your tampon leaks just after a few hours, try going up an absorbency size for better comfort and protection*. Simply go up from Light to Regular or from your current size up to the next higher absorbency. Only Tampax Pearl tampons have five absorbencies so you can find your flow combo. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs Find your Flow Combo If your tampon is uncomfortable to remove, go down for a lighter absorbency*. Choose the right tampon absorbency throughout your period for better comfort and protection. Simply go down from Ultra to Super Plus or from your current size down to the next lightest absorbency. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs

Outstanding Protection with Tampax Pearl LeakGuard Braid Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core. Controlled Insertion The Anti-Slip Grip lets you hold the applicator securely, so you can insert the tampon with its rounded tip comfortably and easily. Smooth Removal Layer A smooth layer makes for easy tampon removal and outstanding comfort during your period. FormFit Protection FormFit design gently expands to fit your individual shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period.

Frequently Asked Questions How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons? Tampax Pearl Tampons have a special LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen, while a Smooth Removal Layer allows for easy removal. Plus, FormFit Protection gently expands to fit your individual shape. How long can I wear a tampon? You can wear a tampon for up to eight hours, but never leave it in for longer than that. If you usually sleep longer, set an alarm or just use a pad instead. How do I know which absorbency to use? Choosing the right tampon absorbency can make a big difference to be comfortable and avoid leaks. Take the Tampax Quiz on Tampax's website to learn more. What makes Tampax Pearl different from Tampax Pocket Pearl? Both Tampax Pearl and Tampax Pocket Pearl offer outstanding protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help prevent leaks. The main difference is that Tampax Pocket Pearl is compact in size so it fits in your pocket. When ready to use, extend the compact applicator to make it a full-size one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As expected. Even though it is expensive, it is well worth it to buy. Speedy delivery. Well packed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR LIGHT DAYS
reviews.reviewText: I DONT GET A PERIOD BECAUSE I GET THE DEPO SHOT (BIRTH CONTROL) SOMETIMES I DO SPOT. THESE ARE PERFECT FOR LIGHT DAYS. APLICATOR IS SMOOTH. PLEASED WITH PURCHASE - RAHILA BERKELEY CA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a very light flow and these do a great job on my heavy days. I would also recommend them for someone just starting their period as they are smaller than the heavier flow tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not many brands have lites only tampons
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes it's just very uncomfortable to put in a regular absorbency tampon when you're only bleeding a small amount. Sometimes I just don't feel like wearing my period underwear or a pad so these are wonderful. Also there are some times when I'm not planning on having a tampon in for a full 6 to 9 hours so throwing in a light tampon is perfect for having to pull it out in 2 or 3 hours and not wanting that uncomfortable feeling like my insides are being pulled out with the tampon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good For Teens
reviews.reviewText: These work well for younger teens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They do what they are meant to do lol. I have been using this brand for over 20 years and k will continue to purchase them. The plastic applicator is perfect and the braided end helps any leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for light periods
reviews.reviewText: It was late, so it came on the last day of my period, but it's perfect for those with a lighter period and/or people who pee often. I use a disc overnight then use lights/regulars during the day. Buying in bulk makes the price worth it and they last forever when you use it with cups/discs. I would just use discs, but I feel like when I use it back to back I start getting sore. So this is perfect.
